p: Prior to the start of the experiment at day 1, there were no significant weights differences between the rats among all of the groups. In the period of CUS exposure (10 days) the weight of rats markedly decreased compared to control group ( P < 0.001, Table 3). Moreover, at the end of treatment (25 days), body weight also decreased in the CUS + FLX compared with the baseline (( P < 0.01) and CUS + saline group ( P < 0.05; Table 3).
